title: 2024 Excellence in Community Engagement Award Winners announced | Current Students | West Virginia University
text: The Center for Community Engagement’s annual Excellence in Community Engagement Awards honor extraordinary accomplishments in engaged learning and community impact. The recognition criteria for these awards are founded upon demonstration of the Mountaineer Values of Service, Curiosity, Respect, Accountability and Appreciation. The awards are given in categories that include Social Action, Undergraduate Student, Graduate Student, Faculty, Staff, Service-Learning Instruction, Community Partner and Campus Partner. Join us in congratulating this year’s winners: Cole Unger Social Action Award — [Data-Driven WV](https://business.wvu.edu/research-outreach/data-driven-wv) Undergraduate Student Award — Brianna Myers, a forensic chemistry major minoring in biology and psychology. Graduate Student Award — [Raphael Oladokun](https://soumyasrivastava.faculty.wvu.edu/people/raphael-oladokun) Faculty Award — [Mark Brazaitis](https://english.wvu.edu/faculty-and-staff/faculty-directory/mark-brazaitis) Staff Award — [Eftihia Arkoudis](https://www.music.wvu.edu/faculty/eftihia-arkoudis) Service-Learning Instruction Award — [Elizabeth Claydon](https://directory.hsc.wvu.edu/Profile/56743) Engaged Research Scholar Award — [Kevin Orner](https://directory.statler.wvu.edu/faculty-staff-directory/kevin-orner) Outstanding Community Partner Award — [SteppingStones](https://www.steppingstoneswv.org/) Outstanding Campus Partner Award — WVU Falling Run, [Rich Wolff](https://fallingrun.wvu.edu/contact) National Service Award — [Sarah Toothman](https://communityengagement.wvu.edu/about/our-team/sarah-toothman) Outstanding Athlete in Service Award — [Grace Cronen](https://wvusports.com/sports/womens-rowing/roster/grace-cronen/17460)
